Part of my responsibilities is to design a very robust solution for a 24/7 support group handling voice and data. Using the power of Asterisk and Ruby On Rails, I am able to achieve the best solutions, ranging from back-end integration to reporting dashboards.

Core Developer. Working 8-5 with System Administration and 6-NUTTS in Development. Experienced in developing platform in JAVA. Developed and pioneered Telecommunication Protocol Gateways. CIMD, SMPP, UCP gateways developed under J2SE. 10 Years experience in *nix environment. Know languages Ruby, RoR, C/C++/#, J2SE, J2ME, J2EE, PHP, Python, Perl, HTML, JavaScript, SQL, Bash, Xcode. Last employment was a Senior Research and Development Engineer. Prototyping from Telco interfaces to Mobile Phone J2ME Clients.
